Is this a flashback? Isn't there one where he has her telling him about all the different guys she's fucking?

I don't need monologues, especially when it comes to interpersonal relationships between men and women. What people do is infinitely more important than what they say or think. Would knowing her thought process change how you view her actions? Honestly?

I wish this actually showed what they think a bit more, I can't bring myself to care much about this when I don't know what they're even thinking. Iida never seemed to really hesitate at all so where's the feeling of netorare? Kousei just becomes super passive so there's no feeling like he and Iida belong together either. Also is the bald guy just an idiot or is he being malicious on purpose? By now he should have a feeling Iida seems to not care much about Kousei so why send the video of them having sex to Kousei?
